worklogs.comment:
javierluraschi commented on pull request #4011: ARROW-4995: [R] Support for winbuilder for CRAN checks
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4011
 
 
   Fix for https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4995. [winbuilder](https://win-builder.r-project.org/) provides a test environment similar to the CRAN build infrastructure to validate packages before submitting to CRAN. This PR fixes the remaining warnings flagged by this sytem.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on to GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

romainfrancois commented on pull request #4011: ARROW-4995: [R] Support for winbuilder for CRAN checks
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4011#discussion_r268573077
 
 

 ##########
 File path: r/NAMESPACE

 @@ -178,5 +177,6 @@ importFrom(rlang,dots_n)
 importFrom(rlang,list2)
 importFrom(rlang,warn)
 importFrom(tibble,as_tibble)
+importFrom(withr,defer)
 
 Review comment:
   I was going to ask why importing `defer` as we never use it, but I guess from the win builder results here; https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4995?filter=12344983
   
   ```
   -- 3. Error: feather read/write round trip (@test-feather.R#23)  ---------------
     could not find function "defer"
     1: local_tempfile() at testthat/test-feather.R:23
     2: defer_parent(unlink(tf), ...)
     3: eval(substitute(defer(expr, envir, priority), list(
   ... 
   ```
   
   This has been fixed in `withr` in https://github.com/r-lib/withr/pull/81
